title: Mobile app
body: hello , after downloading the app i signed in , but i cant see my friends or anything ,i waited for like 20 min ,nothing happened , i don't know what should i do , i tried to delete the app and reinstall it again , but still the same problem !!

replies.body:
You're probably better off posting on EU or NA boards. We only have a small volunteer team here and are less likely to be able to help you in a timely manner. I sure don't know anything about the mobile app.

Best guesses would be if you've recently changed your summoner name, or accidentally logged into an account you have on a different region with no friends.
